column4: I am seeking for a program. Now the only way to change default "open with application" (that I know) is that I right-click some file, and adjust those settings there. Are there available any program which can do it?

please help me: I am seeking for a program. Now the only way to change default "open with application" (that I know) is that I right-click some file, and adjust those settings there. Are there available any program which can do it?

Hey, I have a problem: I am seeking for a program. Now the only way to change default "open with application" (that I know) is that I right-click some file, and adjust those settings there. Are there available any program which can do it?
